name: No Coal, Please - PDF download 1021D
description:
Of course they are hung by the chimney with care, but will Saint Nick bring sugar plums and candy canes or will he bringing the dreaded coal?! 

Let your creative spirits soar when you create this wonderfully colorful project. This is the perfect time to raid your fabric stash for those crazy prints that you’ve been dying to use. Personalize the stockings with names of your children, grandchildren, or even some of your close friends! Complete instructions and full size traceable designs make this project a guaranteed success. 

The full size pattern takes the guess work out of pattern arrangement.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 46" x 19"

name: Snips and Snails - PDF download 2025D
description:
This fun little quilt is perfect for the newest edition to your family, a new mommy and quilters who want a special, homemade keepsake for an expectant family. Pattern download contains instructions to make the quilt. "Snips and Snails" was originally designed for the June 2008 "Quilt It" publication.

Skill level: Intermediate 
Quilt Size: 48" x 48" 
Block Size: 12" x 12"

name: Patch of Poppies - PDF download 1064D
description:
This fun little project is a great way to celebrate a favorite fabric collections and quilting technique. Select a charm pack in your favorite colors, from a designer you admire or what catches your eye to create this cheery little quilt for your home.

In addition to the 9 x 9 arrangements included with the pattern, a variety of other setting arrangements can be used. I've included photos of several block arrangement options toward the end of the pattern. These easy flower blocks will have you finished in no time.

Experience Level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 18" x 18"

name: Best Friends Forever - PDF download 1058D
description:
This is the perfect project to show off your favorite fabrics and embellishments. There are many fun variations for customizing the look and functionality of your handbag included in the pattern as well as quilting suggestions. Create a style all your own with this downloaded pattern. Instructions to complete two sizes, a large and medium are included. You won't be able to make just one, make one for a friend - she'll be your "best friend forever".

Skill level: Experienced 
Two Sizes: 13" x 9" x 4" and 15" x 10" x 5"

name: Golden Sunflowers - PDF download 1060D
description:
I always find sunflowers to be so cheerful, so celebrate summer with this little project and add some sunshine to your home. I added a small bee button for a little whimsy.

Place all the sunflower blocks upright for a wall hanging or turn two sunflower blocks upside down for a cheery table runner.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 37" x 20"

name: Christmas Finishing - PDF download 1035D
description:
This pattern contains instructions to combine the 4 small holiday patterns Sammy Snowman, Tree Trimmin, Christmas Candle and Gingerbread Boy (sold separately) into one larger wall quilt that finishes to 39 1/2" x 41 1/2".

Hang the completed quilt anywhere around 
the home from the front door, to the kitchen, or even at the office.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 39 1/2" x 41 1/2"

name: Sammy Snowman - PDF download 1031D
description:
Capture the spirit of season with this jolly and jovial snowman. Create a classic snowman or the funkiest one on the block, use your imagination when selecting fabrics and buttons. The simple shapes found in this design make it a project that can easily be included in even the busiest of holiday schedules.

Hang the completed quilt anywhere around the home from the front door, the kitchen, or even at the office. Don’t forget the three other patterns in the Holiday Collection; Tree Trimmin, GingerBread Boy and Christmas Candle. Hang them individually or sew them together for a crowd pleasing wall hanging.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 10 1/2" x 11 1/2"

name: Tree Trimmin - PDF download 1032D
description:
Get ready for the holidays by creating a wonderful holiday classic, the sky’s the limit when decorating this tree. The simple shapes found in this design make it a project that can easily be included in even the busiest of holiday seasons.

Hang the completed quilt anywhere around the home from the front door, the kitchen, or even at the office. Don’t forget the three other patterns in the Holiday Collection; Sammy Snowman, GingerBread Boy and Christmas Candle. Hang them individually or sew them together for a crowd pleasing wall hanging.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 10 1/2" x 11 1/2"

name: Christmas Candle - PDF download 1034D
description:
Capture the spirit of the season with this classic holiday scene. The solitary candle reminds us of winter evenings spent with our families. The simple shapes found in this design make it a project that can easily be included in even the busiest of holiday seasons.

Hang the completed quilt anywhere around the home from the front door, the kitchen, or even at the office. Don’t forget the three other patterns in the Holiday Collection; Sammy Snowman, GingerBread Boy and Tree Trimmin. Hang them individually or sew them together for a crowd pleasing wall hanging.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 10 1/2" x 11 1/2"

name: GingerBread Boy - PDF download 1033D
description:
Quick catch the gingerbread man before he runs away. It’s fun to decorate this cookie, narrow rick-rack, buttons, bead, the possibilities are endless. The simple shapes found in this design make it a project that can easily be included in even the busiest of holiday seasons.

Hang the completed quilt anywhere around the home from the front door, the kitchen, or even at the office. Don’t forget the three other patterns in the Holiday Collection; Sammy Snowman, Tree Trimmin and Christmas Candle. Hang them individually or sew them together for a crowd pleasing wall hanging.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Quilt Size: 10 1/2" x 11 1/2"

name: O' Christmas Tree - PDF download 1059D
description:
Construct a festive and fun holiday tree, one row at a time, with this downloaded pattern for the O' Christmas Tree. The tree is created by sewing variations of a traditional quilt block for each row and each row features a different block design.

A terrific holiday quilt to snuggle under or hang on the wall, add buttons to the quilt for a festive touch or hang your favorite ornaments from the buttons for a fun decorative touch or unique advent calendar.

Experience Level: Intermediate 
Quilt Size: 60" x 69"

name: Homeward Bound - PDF download 1057D
description:
This striking quilt is made using the simple flying geese unit repeated in rows and includes the "Gaggle of Geese" construction method. Inspired by a printed stripe, I selected a rainbow of colors for the geese in these quilts. Pattern includes instructions to complete two sizes.

Skill level: Experienced Beginner 
Bed Quilt Size: 98" x 104" 
Lap Quilt Size: 72" x 75"

name: Building Blocks book - PDF download 1065D
description:
Add a loving touch to the nursery with this collection of charming projects ready for your special little one to snuggle, cuddle and curl up with. The “oh, so cute” appliqués (lion, lamb, bunny and bear) are interchangeable allowing you to personalize each project with your favorite design.

• Choose from 5 fast and fun quilts featuring simple piecing and easy, interchangeable appliqués
• Soft wall quilts with adorable characters are a charming addition to the nursery
• Keep the theme going with a quilted door hanger to send out a special message of baby sleeping.
• A decorative pillow is the perfect accent for the chair or rocker
• Soft, stacking baby blocks are great for decoration or play

Skill level: Experienced Beginner

name: Pieced Blocks & Border - PDF download 2001D
description:
First pattern in the Flowers all a Bloomn' BOM pattern series.

This pattern contains the instructions to PIECE the BACKGROUND lattice blocks for the 12 circular appliques and the lattice border to complete the Flowers all a Bloomn' quilt. Only the yardage and instructions for the pieced lattice blocks and border at contained in this pattern.

Skill level: Advanced 
Quilt Size: 90" x 110" 
Block Size: 20" x 20"

name: Harvest Spice BOM - PDF download 1000D
description:
I get so many requests for this old Block-of-the-Month pattern that I'm making it available here as a pdf download pattern. This pattern was written specifically for the Harvest Spice fabric line (no longer available), the five wreath designs were a printed fabric panel and not appliqued.

This pattern contains instructions to construct the nine pieced blocks and complete the quilt top. NO FABRIC REQUIREMENTS ARE GIVEN because this pattern was only available as part of the fabric kit and not sold individually.

Multiple machine piecing methods are used through out to introduce quilters to different techniques each month.

Experience Level: Experienced Beginner to Intermediate 
Quilt Size: 90" x 90"
